CustomField.description: Indicates if Contract B agent has met the FYC and submission requirements.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Type__c, 'Contract B'), Total_FYC__c >= 2500 && Opportunity_Count__c >= 5, FALSE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TRUE if Contract B agent has met $2,500 FYC and 5 submission requirements.
CustomField.label: Requirements Met
